data.name: Dignified Fantasy Music Vol.2
data.detailed_description:
From BitterSweet Entertainment to the all users of SMILE GAME BUILDER, the third music resource pack is on sale!

This “Dignified Fantasy Music Vol.2” is a music resource pack which can be used for the traditional world of fantasy RPGs. It includes 20 BGM files produced by an energetic composer, Yu Namikoshi.

This is a great resource pack for various scenes like “Dignified Fantasy Music Vol.1”. Especially, the each introduction part is very emotional, so every scene can be more dramatic and dynamic. This pack will definitely expand the world of SMILE GAME BUILDER and fulfill your creative desire and adventurous spirit.

*This resource pack can be used regardless of commercial or non-commercial with royalty-free within only games which are rendered by SMILE GAME BUILDER.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Athlon™ II (K10)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 400 series, AMD Radeon™ HD 5000 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
